## ICreateVerifiableCredentialArgs.save property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
>
> Please call [dataStoreSaveVerifiableCredential()](./core.idatastore.datastoresaveverifiablecredential.md) to save the credential after creating it.

If this parameter is true, the resulting VerifiablePresentation is sent to the [storage plugin](./core.idatastore.md) to be saved.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
save?: boolean;
```
